transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Uh sir dekhiye na aapko closer diye hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Mam mere papa kahi gaye hue hai.
Customer: Mobile yahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Mere papa kahi gaye hue hai.
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha awaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Ha aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ha sir ye bol rahi thi ki aapka jo ticket hua tha na to.
Customer: Mere papa kahi gaye hue hai.
Executive: Accha. Kahi gaye hue hai unka phone yahi hai. To to koi phone bhi nahi receive kar raha hai dusre number pe kar rahe hai to.
Customer: Konse number pe kar rahe hai?
Executive: Uh last mein 900 hai.
Customer: 900
Executive: Ha fir 934 hai.
Executive: Dono number aapke hi hai na?
Customer: Unka ek phone wo wala bhi yahi isme hi hai wo wali sim bhi yahi mobile mein hai.
Executive: Accha to aaj ki baat kisse hui thi? Machine machine ko leke ki machine purchase kiya tha fir servicing ke liye koi call nahi receive kar raha hai?
Customer: Wo mujhe nahi pata mam wo aayenge jab main aapki baat karwa dunga.
Executive: Ha please unse baat karwaiye. Ji ji zaruri hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to discuss ticket raised.

Resolution:

- Customer's father is away, phone is with customer.
- Executive asked about machine purchase and servicing.
- Customer will have executive talk to his father.

Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, servicing, machine, purchase
